## Loading class

`loading` 模块拦截器

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Loading implements interceptorImpl 
```
**Implements:** [interceptorImpl](./service.interceptorimpl.md)

## Remarks

当你的请求频繁触发 则不建议 配置该模块 因为视图会频繁 `loading`
